author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DALILA BRINGING AREAS OF HEAVY RAINS AND STRONG WINDS ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...DALILA BRINGING AREAS OF HEAVY RAINS AND STRONG WINDS ALONG THE COAST OF SOUTHERN AND SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Fri Jun 13 the center of Dalila was located near 14.8, -102.4 with movement NNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Dalila (EP4/EP042025)
